Html: In addition to zooming capabilities, the ability to move the map using a hand tool would be nice (to center the map for instance)

The demo project (tested with the WPF sample) is always centered on the same point (around vilnius). The mouse event is used to set marker points, but at least to me that's not that useful (I prefer to define them by GPS coordinates). 

A standard feature, available for instance on google maps, is the ability to move the map around with the mouse. The cursor is either crossed-arrows or a hand tool. This is nice because it allows to change the center of the map. 

I hope that makes sense.
